caption: Identity Activity Details
description: The Identity Activity Details object captures usage activity of an Identity i.e. AWS IAM User, GCP IAM Principal, etc.
name: identity_activity_details

credential_last_used_time.description: Timestamp when the credential, represented by the credential_uid, was last used.

password_last_used_time.description: Timestamp when the password was last used for authentication.

user_last_seen_time.description: Timestamp when the user account was last active.
